channel.title: CrazedPkz
channel.description:
Hello, and welcome to the [color=Green]CrazedPkz[/color]'s development team if you choose to join after hearing this post.
I am tired of seeing all these "remakes" that keep constantly failing at being a successful operation. Wasn't the point of Rsps that you could make your own online utopia? We were doing this for a couple of years; then Mod Vault came along, and wanted to get famous by making a exact replica of the Runescape from 2006/2007. It took him a while to battle with himself which year he wanted to replicate. I personally believe he picked 2006 because it's a whole lot less work; 52 less updates to add. When everyone seen how much money, and fame this guy was getting; they thought, "Oh, wow! I want to get famous quickly!" Maybe I'm wrong, but tons of Runescape 2006-2007 remakes started popping up like crazy even though they are shit coded attempts.
I am wanting to make something better than the old Runescape; I personally can't program Java. I can defiantly design in html, and php. This will have everything Runescape had but better. We'll add our own unique updates to our soon to be grand server.
[b]Applications:[/b] Web Designer: [code] Name: YOE: Msn: Proof: [/code] GFX Designer: [code] Name: YOE: Msn: Proof: [/code] Server Coder: [code] Name: YOE: Msn: Proof: [/code] Client Coder: [code] Name: YOE: Msn: Proof: [/code]

item.title: CrazedPkz
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

xxxtilllyxxx:

Yeah, stabbed times infinity + 1.

size=5÷ 0 = ???[/size]

[size=3]I divided by zero. We are all fucked.[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: CrazedPkz
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“chillwitm888, post:5, topic:432989”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=535709.msg3916633#msg3916633 date=1329265016]

I personally can’t program Java. I can defiantly design in html, and php

So…are you expecting other people do do the work for you? good luck finding people willing to be your slaves, while you take all credit for THEIR hard work.

Vault has already succeeded with this.

who?
[/quote]uugh… Rsvault, rs2006, a major dickhead hint-hint?
Not that I know him but, he makes people pay just to play
and He hasn’t done a single bit of the coding on his server.[/quote]

wow, people like that need to get stabbed in the back.

Read full topic
